column2: China Green Agriculture, Inc. engages in the research, development, production, and sale of various types of fertilizers and agricultural products. The company is headquartered in Xi'An, Shaanxi and currently employs 424 full-time employees. The firm's segments include Jinong (fertilizer production), Gufeng (fertilizer production) and Yuxing (agricultural products production). The firm's primary business is of fertilizer products, specifically humic acid-based compound fertilizer produced through Jinong, and compound fertilizer, blended fertilizer, organic compound fertilizer, slow-release fertilizers, water-soluble fertilizers and mixed organic-inorganic compound fertilizer produced through Gufeng.
3rd Floor, Borough A, Block A. No. 181, South Taibai Road
